.
Eligibility for Chapter 18 Benefits
38 U.S.C. Chapter 18
benefits are
not
dependent on the COD.  That is, regardless of the characterization of the service of the Veteran parent, individuals may receive Chapter 18 benefits if the necessary service and relationship requirements are met.
Reference
:  For more information on Chapter 18 benefits, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 3
.
